# thunder_fw_vrid (Resource)

`thunder_fw_vrid`: Vrrp group ID

__PLACEHOLDER__

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "thunder" {
  address  = var.dut9049
  username = var.username
  password = var.password
}
resource "thunder_fw_vrid" "thunder_fw_vrid" {

  vrid = 2
}
```
